timeline.bodyText: Seems getting this system property is repeated multiple times. Can we have this at one place and refer from wherever needed?
timeline.author: Kishanthan

replies.bodyText: I thought I would be cleaning up later. Couldn't think of top level place for all the modules? Any suggestions? Or we can leave it as I would be removing it after moving to a new branch.
replies.author: riyafa
